We support men with their mental health through conversation and positive action. #ITSOKAYTOTALK","type":"text"}]}]},"button_target":{"id":"2044bc06-79e9-45ee-b058-33589a20aae5","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":"faqs-sections"},"background_color":"bg-white"},{"_uid":"b26b11d5-dbd7-4157-a7ac-fc6e1b7b1bd8","position":"right","component":"badge","background_color":"bg-black"},{"_uid":"c7e1f457-4a46-46a7-995f-5a8d7da128c0","label":"Who we are","title":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We break down the stigma of men's mental health.","type":"text"}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"ANDYSMANCLUB is a male-only support group where men aged 18 and over can come and get things off their chest and speak openly about their mental health in a judgement-free, non-clinical environment. ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We have almost ","type":"text"},{"text":"130 groups","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"/testimonial-sections","uuid":"f923d539-4e07-4dbc-a6b3-12e3a6e449aa","anchor":null,"target":null,"linktype":"story"}}]},{"text":" across the UK, where each group meets at the same time each week, ","type":"text"},{"text":"every Monday (except bank holidays) at 7pm.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":"  ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"With a service used on a weekly basis by ","type":"text"},{"text":"over 3000 men","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.google.co.uk/","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":null,"linktype":"url"}}]},{"text":" and an army of over 900 volunteers on board, the movement is continuing to grow on a week by week basis. It takes ","type":"text"},{"text":"true courage","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"test@test.com","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":null,"linktype":"email"}}]},{"text":" for a ","type":"text"},{"text":"man","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/800x800/9554bac8c2/800x800.png","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":null,"linktype":"asset"}}]},{"text":" to admit when he’s down but ","type":"text"},{"text":"#ITSOKAYTOTALK","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":".","type":"text"}]}]},"component":"two-column-text","button_text":"More about us","button_target":{"id":"f923d539-4e07-4dbc-a6b3-12e3a6e449aa","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":"testimonial-sections"},"background_color":"bg-white","white_background":false},{"_uid":"13bb0473-9500-466f-8761-42e823936399","image":{"id":4396379,"alt":"","name":"","focus":null,"title":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/1000x750/b160a0bfdd/1000x750.png","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset"},"label":"ANDY’S MAN CLUB","title":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"THE FIRST RULE ABOUT ANDYSMANCLUB IS ","type":"text"},{"text":"IT’S OKAY TO TALK","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":" AT ANDYSMANCLUB.","type":"text"}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Simply put, that’s the whole point. It’s a group where men don’t have to battle to be heard or listened to, but where they can join the fight against reducing the rate of mental illness, depression and suicide in men.","type":"text"}]}]},"component":"simple-center-branded-with-image","button_text":"Button here","button_target":{"id":"8e39701f-c3fd-4cab-aff1-d06075e84542","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":"site-defaults"},"background_color":"bg-white"},{"_uid":"7c8d2869-962b-4285-900a-59de462c1361","image":{"id":4440460,"alt":"","name":"","focus":null,"title":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/500x700/318c361fba/500x700-1.png","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset"},"label":"Our Why","title":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"WE HAVE ONE AIM, TO HELP ONE GUY, TO SAVE ONE LIFE.","type":"text"}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"ANDYSMANCLUB takes its name from Andrew Roberts, ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"a man who sadly took his own life aged 23 in early 2016. Andy was a lovely and doting father, son, brother, grandson, nephew, cousin and friend, and was just 23 years old when he was taken away by suicide, sadly and tragically without warning.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"On average one man every two hours takes his life in the UK. It’s often said to be a factor is that men don’t talk. That’s why ANDYSMANCLUB was born. Established in 2016 by Luke Ambler, Andy’s brother-in-law, the aim of the club is to break down these stigmas, support men struggling with mental health issues and lend a hand to suicide prevention. ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"That change starts with you...","type":"text"}]}]},"component":"two-column-text-image","button_text":"Donate We support men with their mental health through conversation and positive action. #ITSOKAYTOTALK","type":"text"}]}]},"button_target":{"id":"2044bc06-79e9-45ee-b058-33589a20aae5","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":"faqs-sections"},"background_color":"bg-white"},{"_uid":"b26b11d5-dbd7-4157-a7ac-fc6e1b7b1bd8","position":"right","component":"badge","background_color":"bg-black"},{"_uid":"c7e1f457-4a46-46a7-995f-5a8d7da128c0","label":"Who we are","title":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We break down the stigma of men's mental health.","type":"text"}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"ANDYSMANCLUB is a male-only support group where men aged 18 and over can come and get things off their chest and speak openly about their mental health in a judgement-free, non-clinical environment. ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We have almost ","type":"text"},{"text":"130 groups","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"/testimonial-sections","uuid":"f923d539-4e07-4dbc-a6b3-12e3a6e449aa","anchor":null,"target":null,"linktype":"story"}}]},{"text":" across the UK, where each group meets at the same time each week, ","type":"text"},{"text":"every Monday (except bank holidays) at 7pm.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":"  ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"With a service used on a weekly basis by ","type":"text"},{"text":"over 3000 men","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.google.co.uk/","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":null,"linktype":"url"}}]},{"text":" and an army of over 900 volunteers on board, the movement is continuing to grow on a week by week basis. It takes ","type":"text"},{"text":"true courage","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"test@test.com","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":null,"linktype":"email"}}]},{"text":" for a ","type":"text"},{"text":"man","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/800x800/9554bac8c2/800x800.png","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":null,"linktype":"asset"}}]},{"text":" to admit when he’s down but ","type":"text"},{"text":"#ITSOKAYTOTALK","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":".","type":"text"}]}]},"component":"two-column-text","button_text":"More about us","button_target":{"id":"f923d539-4e07-4dbc-a6b3-12e3a6e449aa","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":"testimonial-sections"},"background_color":"bg-white","white_background":false},{"_uid":"13bb0473-9500-466f-8761-42e823936399","image":{"id":4396379,"alt":"","name":"","focus":null,"title":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/1000x750/b160a0bfdd/1000x750.png","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset"},"label":"ANDY’S MAN CLUB","title":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"THE FIRST RULE ABOUT ANDYSMANCLUB IS ","type":"text"},{"text":"IT’S OKAY TO TALK","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":" AT ANDYSMANCLUB.","type":"text"}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Simply put, that’s the whole point. It’s a group where men don’t have to battle to be heard or listened to, but where they can join the fight against reducing the rate of mental illness, depression and suicide in men.","type":"text"}]}]},"component":"simple-center-branded-with-image","button_text":"Button here","button_target":{"id":"8e39701f-c3fd-4cab-aff1-d06075e84542","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":"site-defaults"},"background_color":"bg-white"},{"_uid":"7c8d2869-962b-4285-900a-59de462c1361","image":{"id":4440460,"alt":"","name":"","focus":null,"title":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/500x700/318c361fba/500x700-1.png","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset"},"label":"Our Why","title":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"WE HAVE ONE AIM, TO HELP ONE GUY, TO SAVE ONE LIFE.","type":"text"}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"ANDYSMANCLUB takes its name from Andrew Roberts, ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"a man who sadly took his own life aged 23 in early 2016. Andy was a lovely and doting father, son, brother, grandson, nephew, cousin and friend, and was just 23 years old when he was taken away by suicide, sadly and tragically without warning.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"On average one man every two hours takes his life in the UK. It’s often said to be a factor is that men don’t talk. That’s why ANDYSMANCLUB was born. Established in 2016 by Luke Ambler, Andy’s brother-in-law, the aim of the club is to break down these stigmas, support men struggling with mental health issues and lend a hand to suicide prevention. ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"That change starts with you...","type":"text"}]}]},"component":"two-column-text-image","button_text":"Donate
